mapper.insert: insert into user ( user_mail, user_password, user_name, user_nickname, user_phonenumber, user_profile, user_self, user_enterdate, user_final, user_role ) VALUES( #{user_mail}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_phonenumber}, #{user_profile}, #{user_self}, now(), now(), #{user_role} );

insert into user ( user_mail, user_password, user_name, user_nickname, user_phonenumber, user_profile, user_self, user_enterdate, user_final, user_role, user_path ) VALUES( #{user_mail}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_phonenumber}, #{user_profile}, #{user_self}, now(), now(), #{user_role}, "kakao" );
mapper.select: select user_profile, user_mail, user_phonenumber, user_self, user_nickname, user_role, user_name from user where user_num = #{user_num}

SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE user_nickname = #{user_nickname}
